statements: UPDATE NFTs SET token_id = 12345, token_uri = 'https://example.com/nft1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE NFTs SET token_uri = 'https://example.com/nft2', token_id = 54321 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE NFTs SET token_uri = 'https://nft1.com/token123' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE NFTs SET token_id = 456, token_uri = 'https://nft2.com/token456' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE nft_token SET owner_address = '0xabc123' WHERE token_id = 12345;
UPDATE nft_minter SET procedures = '{"minting": true}' WHERE minter_id = 1;
UPDATE nft_token SET owner_address='0x123456789' WHERE token_id=987654321
UPDATE nft_minter SET minter_name='Alice', procedures='{"create":true,"update":true}' WHERE minter_id=123
UPDATE NFTs SET name = 'New Artwork Name', created_at = NOW() WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE MintingRequests SET status = 'Approved', request_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE request_id = 456;
UPDATE NFTs SET name='New Artwork' WHERE id=1
UPDATE MintingRequests SET status='Approved', requester='John Doe' WHERE request_id=100
UPDATE nft_collections SET collection_name = 'New Collection Name' WHERE collection_id = 1;
UPDATE nfts SET collection_id = 2 WHERE nft_id = 5;
UPDATE minting_requests SET status = 'Approved' WHERE request_id = 1;
UPDATE nfts SET collection_id = 2, nft_name = 'Updated NFT Name' WHERE nft_id = 5;
UPDATE NFTs SET owner_id = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Tokens SET token_name = 'New Token' WHERE token_id = 5;
UPDATE NFTs SET owner_id = 1001, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = 2001;
UPDATE MintingRequests SET request_status = 'APPROVED', request_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE request_id = 3003;
